ayahs.text: Al^r tiloka 'aAya`tu {lokita`bi {lomubiyni
<in~aA^ >anzalona`hu quro'a`nFA Earabiy~FA l~aEal~akumo taEoqiluwna
naHonu naquS~u Ealayoka >aHosana {loqaSaSi bimaA^ >awoHayonaA^ <ilayoka ha`*aA {loquro'aAna wa<in kunta min qabolihi. lamina {loga`filiyna
<i*o qaAla yuwsufu li>abiyhi ya`^>abati <in~iY ra>ayotu >aHada Ea$ara kawokabFA wa{l$~amosa wa{loqamara ra>ayotuhumo liY sa`jidiyna
qaAla ya`bunaY~a laA taqoSuSo ru'oyaAka EalaY`^ <ixowatika fayakiyduwA@ laka kayodFA <in~a {l$~ayoTa`na lilo<insa`ni Eaduw~N m~ubiynN

waka*a`lika yajotabiyka rab~uka wayuEal~imuka min ta>owiyli {lo>aHaAdiyvi wayutim~u niEomatahu, Ealayoka waEalaY`^ 'aAli yaEoquwba kamaA^ >atam~ahaA EalaY`^ >abawayoka min qabolu <ibora`hiyma wa<isoHa`qa <in~a rab~aka EaliymN HakiymN
l~aqado kaAna fiY yuwsufa wa<ixowatihi.^ 'aAya`tN l~ils~aA^}iliyna
<i*o qaAluwA@ layuwsufu wa>axuwhu >aHab~u <ilaY`^ >abiynaA min~aA wanaHonu EuSobapN <in~a >abaAnaA lafiY Dala`lK m~ubiynK
{qotuluwA@ yuwsufa >awi {ToraHuwhu >aroDFA yaxolu lakumo wajohu >abiykumo watakuwnuwA@ min[ baEodihi. qawomFA Sa`liHiyna
qaAla qaA^}ilN m~inohumo laA taqotuluwA@ yuwsufa wa>aloquwhu fiY gaya`bati {lojub~i yalotaqiTohu baEoDu {ls~ay~aArapi <in kuntumo fa`Eiliyna
qaAluwA@ ya`^>abaAnaA maA laka laA ta>oma+n~aA EalaY` yuwsufa wa<in~aA lahu, lana`SiHuwna
>arosilohu maEanaA gadFA yarotaEo wayaloEabo wa<in~aA lahu, laHa`fiZuwna
qaAla <in~iY layaHozununiY^ >an ta*ohabuwA@ bihi. wa>axaAfu >an ya>okulahu {l*~i}obu wa>antumo Eanohu ga`filuwna
qaAluwA@ la}ino >akalahu {l*~i}obu wanaHonu EuSobapN <in~aA^ <i*FA l~axa`siruwna
falam~aA *ahabuwA@ bihi. wa>ajomaEuw^A@ >an yajoEaluwhu fiY gaya`bati {lojub~i wa>awoHayonaA^ <ilayohi latunab~i}an~ahum bi>amorihimo ha`*aA wahumo laA ya$oEuruwna
wajaA^'uw^ >abaAhumo Ei$aA^'F yabokuwna
qaAluwA@ ya`^>abaAnaA^ <in~aA *ahabonaA nasotabiqu watarakonaA yuwsufa Einda mata`EinaA fa>akalahu {l*~i}obu wamaA^ >anta bimu&ominK l~anaA walawo kun~aA Sa`diqiyna
wajaA^'uw EalaY` qamiySihi. bidamK ka*ibK qaAla balo saw~alato lakumo >anfusukumo >amorFA faSaborN jamiylN wa{ll~ahu {lomusotaEaAnu EalaY` maA taSifuwna
wajaA^'ato say~aArapN fa>arosaluwA@ waAridahumo fa>adolaY` dalowahu, qaAla ya`bu$oraY` ha`*aA gula`mN wa>asar~uwhu biDa`EapF wa{ll~ahu EaliymN[ bimaA yaEomaluwna
wa$arawohu bivamanK] baxosK dara`hima maEoduwdapK wakaAnuwA@ fiyhi mina {lz~a`hidiyna

waqaAla {l~a*iY {$otaraY`hu min m~iSora li{mora>atihi.^ >akorimiY mavowaY`hu EasaY`^ >an yanfaEanaA^ >awo nat~axi*ahu, waladFA waka*a`lika mak~an~aA liyuwsufa fiY {lo>aroDi walinuEal~imahu, min ta>owiyli {lo>aHaAdiyvi wa{ll~ahu gaAlibN EalaY`^ >amorihi. wala`kin~a >akovara {ln~aAsi laA yaEolamuwna
walam~aA balaga >a$ud~ahu,^ 'aAtayona`hu HukomFA waEilomFA waka*a`lika najoziY {lomuHosiniyna
wara`wadatohu {l~atiY huwa fiY bayotihaA Ean n~afosihi. wagal~aqati {lo>abowa`ba waqaAlato hayota laka qaAla maEaA*a {ll~ahi <in~ahu, rab~iY^ >aHosana mavowaAYa <in~ahu, laA yufoliHu {lZ~a`limuwna
walaqado ham~ato bihi. waham~a bihaA lawolaA^ >an r~a'aA buroha`na rab~ihi. ka*a`lika linaSorifa Eanohu {ls~uw^'a wa{lofaHo$aA^'a <in~ahu, mino EibaAdinaA {lomuxolaSiyna
wa{sotabaqaA {lobaAba waqad~ato qamiySahu, min duburK wa>alofayaA say~idahaA ladaA {lobaAbi qaAlato maA jazaA^'u mano >araAda bi>aholika suw^'FA <il~aA^ >an yusojana >awo Ea*aAbN >aliymN
qaAla hiYa ra`wadatoniY Ean n~afosiY wa$ahida $aAhidN m~ino >aholihaA^ <in kaAna qamiySuhu, qud~a min qubulK faSadaqato wahuwa mina {loka`*ibiyna
wa<in kaAna qamiySuhu, qud~a min duburK faka*abato wahuwa mina {lS~a`diqiyna
falam~aA ra'aA qamiySahu, qud~a min duburK qaAla <in~ahu, min kayodikun~a <in~a kayodakun~a EaZiymN
yuwsufu >aEoriDo Eano ha`*aA wa{sotagofiriY li*an[biki <in~aki kunti mina {loxaATi_#iyna
waqaAla nisowapN fiY {lomadiynapi {mora>atu {loEaziyzi tura`widu fataY`haA Ean n~afosihi. qado $agafahaA Hub~FA <in~aA lanaraY`haA fiY Dala`lK m~ubiynK

falam~aA samiEato bimakorihin~a >arosalato <ilayohin~a wa>aEotadato lahun~a mut~aka_#FA wa'aAtato kul~a wa`HidapK m~inohun~a sik~iynFA waqaAlati {xorujo Ealayohin~a falam~aA ra>ayonahu,^ >akobaronahu, waqaT~aEona >ayodiyahun~a waqulona Ha`$a lil~ahi maA ha`*aA ba$arFA <ino ha`*aA^ <il~aA malakN kariymN
qaAlato fa*a`likun~a {l~a*iY lumotun~aniY fiyhi walaqado ra`wadt~uhu, Ean n~afosihi. fa{sotaEoSama wala}in l~amo yafoEalo maA^ 'aAmuruhu, layusojanan~a walayakuwnFA m~ina {lS~a`giriyna
qaAla rab~i {ls~ijonu >aHab~u <ilaY~a mim~aA yadoEuwnaniY^ <ilayohi wa<il~aA taSorifo Ean~iY kayodahun~a >aSobu <ilayohin~a wa>akun m~ina {loja`hiliyna
fa{sotajaAba lahu, rab~uhu, faSarafa Eanohu kayodahun~a <in~ahu, huwa {ls~amiyEu {loEaliymu
vum~a badaA lahum m~in[ baEodi maA ra>awuA@ {lo'aAya`ti layasojunun~ahu, Hat~aY` HiynK

wadaxala maEahu {ls~ijona fatayaAni qaAla >aHaduhumaA^ <in~iY^ >araY`niY^ >aEoSiru xamorFA waqaAla {lo'aAxaru <in~iY^ >araY`niY^ >aHomilu fawoqa ra>osiY xubozFA ta>okulu {lT~ayoru minohu nab~i}onaA bita>owiylihi.^ <in~aA naraY`ka mina {lomuHosiniyna

qaAla laA ya>otiykumaA TaEaAmN turozaqaAnihi.^ <il~aA nab~a>otukumaA bita>owiylihi. qabola >an ya>otiyakumaA *a`likumaA mim~aA Eal~amaniY rab~iY^ <in~iY tarakotu mil~apa qawomK l~aA yu&ominuwna bi{ll~ahi wahum bi{lo'aAxirapi humo ka`firuwna

wa{t~abaEotu mil~apa 'aAbaA^'iY^ <ibora`hiyma wa<isoHa`qa wayaEoquwba maA kaAna lanaA^ >an n~u$orika bi{ll~ahi min $aYo'K *a`lika min faDoli {ll~ahi EalayonaA waEalaY {ln~aAsi wala`kin~a >akovara {ln~aAsi laA ya$okuruwna
ya`SaY`HibaYi {ls~ijoni 'a>arobaAbN m~utafar~iquwna xayorN >ami {ll~ahu {lowa`Hidu {loqah~aAru

maA taEobuduwna min duwnihi.^ <il~aA^ >asomaA^'F sam~ayotumuwhaA^ >antumo wa'aAbaA^&ukum m~aA^ >anzala {ll~ahu bihaA min suloTa`nK <ini {loHukomu <il~aA lil~ahi >amara >al~aA taEobuduw^A@ <il~aA^ <iy~aAhu *a`lika {ld~iynu {loqay~imu wala`kin~a >akovara {ln~aAsi laA yaEolamuwna
ya`SaY`HibaYi {ls~ijoni >am~aA^ >aHadukumaA fayasoqiY rab~ahu, xamorFA wa>am~aA {lo'aAxaru fayuSolabu fata>okulu {lT~ayoru min r~a>osihi. quDiYa {lo>amoru {l~a*iY fiyhi tasotafotiyaAni
waqaAla lil~a*iY Zan~a >an~ahu, naAjK m~inohumaA {*okuroniY Einda rab~ika fa>ansaY`hu {l$~ayoTa`nu *ikora rab~ihi. falabiva fiY {ls~ijoni biDoEa siniyna

waqaAla {lomaliku <in~iY^ >araY` saboEa baqara`tK simaAnK ya>okuluhun~a saboEN EijaAfN wasaboEa sun[bula`tK xuDorK wa>uxara yaAbisa`tK ya`^>ay~uhaA {lomala>u >afotuwniY fiY ru'oya`Ya <in kuntumo lilr~u'oyaA taEoburuwna
qaAluw^A@ >aDoga`vu >aHola`mK wamaA naHonu bita>owiyli {lo>aHola`mi biEa`limiyna
waqaAla {l~a*iY najaA minohumaA wa{d~akara baEoda >um~apK >anaA" >unab~i}ukum bita>owiylihi. fa>arosiluwni

yuwsufu >ay~uhaA {lS~id~iyqu >afotinaA fiY saboEi baqara`tK simaAnK ya>okuluhun~a saboEN EijaAfN wasaboEi sun[bula`tK xuDorK wa>uxara yaAbisa`tK l~aEal~iY^ >arojiEu <ilaY {ln~aAsi laEal~ahumo yaEolamuwna
qaAla tazoraEuwna saboEa siniyna da>abFA famaA HaSadt~umo fa*aruwhu fiY sun[bulihi.^ <il~aA qaliylFA m~im~aA ta>okuluwna
vum~a ya>otiY min[ baEodi *a`lika saboEN $idaAdN ya>okulona maA qad~amotumo lahun~a <il~aA qaliylFA m~im~aA tuHoSinuwna
vum~a ya>otiY min[ baEodi *a`lika EaAmN fiyhi yugaAvu {ln~aAsu wafiyhi yaEoSiruwna
waqaAla {lomaliku {}otuwniY bihi. falam~aA jaA^'ahu {lr~asuwlu qaAla {rojiEo <ilaY` rab~ika faso_#alohu maA baAlu {ln~isowapi {l~a`tiY qaT~aEona >ayodiyahun~a <in~a rab~iY bikayodihin~a EaliymN

qaAla maA xaTobukun~a <i*o ra`wadt~un~a yuwsufa Ean n~afosihi. qulona Ha`$a lil~ahi maA EalimonaA Ealayohi min suw^'K qaAlati {mora>atu {loEaziyzi {lo_#a`na HaSoHaSa {loHaq~u >anaA" ra`wadt~uhu, Ean n~afosihi. wa<in~ahu, lamina {lS~a`diqiyna
*a`lika liyaEolama >an~iY lamo >axunohu bi{logayobi wa>an~a {ll~aha laA yahodiY kayoda {loxaA^}iniyna
wamaA^ >ubar~i}u nafosiY^ <in~a {ln~afosa la>am~aArapN[ bi{ls~uw^'i <il~aA maA raHima rab~iY^ <in~a rab~iY gafuwrN r~aHiymN
waqaAla {lomaliku {}otuwniY bihi.^ >asotaxoliSohu linafosiY falam~aA kal~amahu, qaAla <in~aka {loyawoma ladayonaA makiynN >amiynN
qaAla {joEaloniY EalaY` xazaA^}ini {lo>aroDi <in~iY HafiyZN EaliymN
waka*a`lika mak~an~aA liyuwsufa fiY {lo>aroDi yatabaw~a>u minohaA Hayovu ya$aA^'u nuSiybu biraHomatinaA man n~a$aA^'u walaA nuDiyEu >ajora {lomuHosiniyna
wala>ajoru {lo'aAxirapi xayorN l~il~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ wakaAnuwA@ yat~aquwna
wajaA^'a <ixowapu yuwsufa fadaxaluwA@ Ealayohi faEarafahumo wahumo lahu, munkiruwna
walam~aA jah~azahum bijahaAzihimo qaAla {}otuwniY bi>axK l~akum m~ino >abiykumo >alaA tarawona >an~iY^ >uwfiY {lokayola wa>anaA" xayoru {lomunziliyna
fa<in l~amo ta>otuwniY bihi. falaA kayola lakumo EindiY walaA taqorabuwni
qaAluwA@ sanura`widu Eanohu >abaAhu wa<in~aA lafa`Eiluwna
waqaAla lifitoya`nihi {joEaluwA@ biDa`Eatahumo fiY riHaAlihimo laEal~ahumo yaEorifuwnahaA^ <i*aA {nqalabuw^A@ <ilaY`^ >aholihimo laEal~ahumo yarojiEuwna
falam~aA rajaEuw^A@ <ilaY`^ >abiyhimo qaAluwA@ ya`^>abaAnaA muniEa min~aA {lokayolu fa>arosilo maEanaA^ >axaAnaA nakotalo wa<in~aA lahu, laHa`fiZuwna
qaAla halo 'aAmanukumo Ealayohi <il~aA kamaA^ >amintukumo EalaY`^ >axiyhi min qabolu fa{ll~ahu xayorN Ha`fiZFA wahuwa >aroHamu {lr~a`Himiyna

walam~aA fataHuwA@ mata`Eahumo wajaduwA@ biDa`Eatahumo rud~ato <ilayohimo qaAluwA@ ya`^>abaAnaA maA nabogiY ha`*ihi. biDa`EatunaA rud~ato <ilayonaA wanamiyru >aholanaA wanaHofaZu >axaAnaA wanazodaAdu kayola baEiyrK *a`lika kayolN yasiyrN
qaAla lano >urosilahu, maEakumo Hat~aY` tu&otuwni mawoviqFA m~ina {ll~ahi lata>otun~aniY bihi.^ <il~aA^ >an yuHaATa bikumo falam~aA^ 'aAtawohu mawoviqahumo qaAla {ll~ahu EalaY` maA naquwlu wakiylN

waqaAla ya`baniY~a laA tadoxuluwA@ min[ baAbK wa`HidK wa{doxuluwA@ mino >abowa`bK m~utafar~iqapK wamaA^ >ugoniY Eankum m~ina {ll~ahi min $aYo'K <ini {loHukomu <il~aA lil~ahi Ealayohi tawak~alotu waEalayohi faloyatawak~ali {lomutawak~iluwna

walam~aA daxaluwA@ mino Hayovu >amarahumo >abuwhum m~aA kaAna yugoniY Eanohum m~ina {ll~ahi min $aYo'K <il~aA HaAjapF fiY nafosi yaEoquwba qaDaY`haA wa<in~ahu, la*uw EilomK l~imaA Eal~amona`hu wala`kin~a >akovara {ln~aAsi laA yaEolamuwna
walam~aA daxaluwA@ EalaY` yuwsufa 'aAwaY`^ <ilayohi >axaAhu qaAla <in~iY^ >anaA" >axuwka falaA tabota}iso bimaA kaAnuwA@ yaEomaluwna
falam~aA jah~azahum bijahaAzihimo jaEala {ls~iqaAyapa fiY raHoli >axiyhi vum~a >a*~ana mu&a*~inN >ay~atuhaA {loEiyru <in~akumo lasa`riquwna
qaAluwA@ wa>aqobaluwA@ Ealayohim m~aA*aA tafoqiduwna
qaAluwA@ nafoqidu SuwaAEa {lomaliki waliman jaA^'a bihi. Himolu baEiyrK wa>anaA" bihi. zaEiymN
qaAluwA@ ta{ll~ahi laqado Ealimotum m~aA ji}onaA linufosida fiY {lo>aroDi wamaA kun~aA sa`riqiyna
qaAluwA@ famaA jaza`^&uhu,^ <in kuntumo ka`*ibiyna
qaAluwA@ jaza`^&uhu, man wujida fiY raHolihi. fahuwa jaza`^&uhu, ka*a`lika najoziY {lZ~a`limiyna

fabada>a bi>awoEiyatihimo qabola wiEaA^'i >axiyhi vum~a {sotaxorajahaA min wiEaA^'i >axiyhi ka*a`lika kidonaA liyuwsufa maA kaAna liya>oxu*a >axaAhu fiY diyni {lomaliki <il~aA^ >an ya$aA^'a {ll~ahu narofaEu daraja`tK m~an n~a$aA^'u wafawoqa kul~i *iY EilomK EaliymN
qaAluw^A@ <in yasoriqo faqado saraqa >axN l~ahu, min qabolu fa>asar~ahaA yuwsufu fiY nafosihi. walamo yubodihaA lahumo qaAla >antumo $ar~N m~akaAnFA wa{ll~ahu >aEolamu bimaA taSifuwna
qaAluwA@ ya`^>ay~uhaA {loEaziyzu <in~a lahu,^ >abFA $ayoxFA kabiyrFA faxu*o >aHadanaA makaAnahu,^ <in~aA naraY`ka mina {lomuHosiniyna
qaAla maEaA*a {ll~ahi >an n~a>oxu*a <il~aA man wajadonaA mata`EanaA Eindahu,^ <in~aA^ <i*FA l~aZa`limuwna

falam~aA {sotayo_#asuwA@ minohu xalaSuwA@ najiy~FA qaAla kabiyruhumo >alamo taEolamuw^A@ >an~a >abaAkumo qado >axa*a Ealayokum m~awoviqFA m~ina {ll~ahi wamin qabolu maA far~aTtumo fiY yuwsufa falano >aboraHa {lo>aroDa Hat~aY` ya>o*ana liY^ >abiY^ >awo yaHokuma {ll~ahu liY wahuwa xayoru {loHa`kimiyna
{rojiEuw^A@ <ilaY`^ >abiykumo faquwluwA@ ya`^>abaAnaA^ <in~a {bonaka saraqa wamaA $ahidonaA^ <il~aA bimaA EalimonaA wamaA kun~aA lilogayobi Ha`fiZiyna
waso_#ali {loqaroyapa {l~atiY kun~aA fiyhaA wa{loEiyra {l~atiY^ >aqobalonaA fiyhaA wa<in~aA laSa`diquwna
qaAla balo saw~alato lakumo >anfusukumo >amorFA faSaborN jamiylN EasaY {ll~ahu >an ya>otiyaniY bihimo jamiyEFA <in~ahu, huwa {loEaliymu {loHakiymu
watawal~aY` Eanohumo waqaAla ya`^>asafaY` EalaY` yuwsufa wa{boyaD~ato EayonaAhu mina {loHuzoni fahuwa kaZiymN
qaAluwA@ ta{ll~ahi tafota&uA@ ta*okuru yuwsufa Hat~aY` takuwna HaraDFA >awo takuwna mina {loha`likiyna
qaAla <in~amaA^ >a$okuwA@ bav~iY waHuzoniY^ <ilaY {ll~ahi wa>aEolamu mina {ll~ahi maA laA taEolamuwna
ya`baniY~a {*ohabuwA@ fataHas~asuwA@ min yuwsufa wa>axiyhi walaA taA@yo_#asuwA@ min r~awoHi {ll~ahi <in~ahu, laA yaA@yo_#asu min r~awoHi {ll~ahi <il~aA {loqawomu {loka`firuwna

falam~aA daxaluwA@ Ealayohi qaAluwA@ ya`^>ay~uhaA {loEaziyzu mas~anaA wa>aholanaA {lD~ur~u waji}onaA bibiDa`EapK m~uzojaY`pK fa>awofi lanaA {lokayola wataSad~aqo EalayonaA^ <in~a {ll~aha yajoziY {lomutaSad~iqiyna
qaAla halo Ealimotum m~aA faEalotum biyuwsufa wa>axiyhi <i*o >antumo ja`hiluwna
qaAluw^A@ >a'in~aka la>anta yuwsufu qaAla >anaA" yuwsufu waha`*aA^ >axiY qado man~a {ll~ahu EalayonaA^ <in~ahu, man yat~aqi wayaSobiro fa<in~a {ll~aha laA yuDiyEu >ajora {lomuHosiniyna
qaAluwA@ ta{ll~ahi laqado 'aAvaraka {ll~ahu EalayonaA wa<in kun~aA laxa`Ti_#iyna
qaAla laA tavoriyba Ealayokumu {loyawoma yagofiru {ll~ahu lakumo wahuwa >aroHamu {lr~a`Himiyna
{*ohabuwA@ biqamiySiY ha`*aA fa>aloquwhu EalaY` wajohi >abiY ya>oti baSiyrFA wa>otuwniY bi>aholikumo >ajomaEiyna
walam~aA faSalati {loEiyru qaAla >abuwhumo <in~iY la>ajidu riyHa yuwsufa lawolaA^ >an tufan~iduwni
qaAluwA@ ta{ll~ahi <in~aka lafiY Dala`lika {loqadiymi
falam~aA^ >an jaA^'a {loba$iyru >aloqaY`hu EalaY` wajohihi. fa{rotad~a baSiyrFA qaAla >alamo >aqul l~akumo <in~iY^ >aEolamu mina {ll~ahi maA laA taEolamuwna
qaAluwA@ ya`^>abaAnaA {sotagofiro lanaA *unuwbanaA^ <in~aA kun~aA xa`Ti_#iyna
qaAla sawofa >asotagofiru lakumo rab~iY^ <in~ahu, huwa {logafuwru {lr~aHiymu
falam~aA daxaluwA@ EalaY` yuwsufa 'aAwaY`^ <ilayohi >abawayohi waqaAla {doxuluwA@ miSora <in $aA^'a {ll~ahu 'aAminiyna

warafaEa >abawayohi EalaY {loEaro$i waxar~uwA@ lahu, suj~adFA waqaAla ya`^>abati ha`*aA ta>owiylu ru'oya`Ya min qabolu qado jaEalahaA rab~iY Haq~FA waqado >aHosana biY^ <i*o >axorajaniY mina {ls~ijoni wajaA^'a bikum m~ina {lobadowi min[ baEodi >an n~azaga {l$~ayoTa`nu bayoniY wabayona <ixowatiY^ <in~a rab~iY laTiyfN l~imaA ya$aA^'u <in~ahu, huwa {loEaliymu {loHakiymu

rab~i qado 'aAtayotaniY mina {lomuloki waEal~amotaniY min ta>owiyli {lo>aHaAdiyvi faATira {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi >anta waliY~i. fiY {ld~unoyaA wa{lo'aAxirapi tawaf~aniY musolimFA wa>aloHiqoniY bi{lS~a`liHiyna
*a`lika mino >an[baA^'i {logayobi nuwHiyhi <ilayoka wamaA kunta ladayohimo <i*o >ajomaEuw^A@ >amorahumo wahumo yamokuruwna
